text: Carlos Álvarez-Nóvoa Sánchez (1940 - 23 September 2015) was a Spanish theatre director, writer, actor and lecturer. He won the 2000 Goya Award for Best New Actor for his performance as Vecino. ==Other websites== * Category:Goya Award winners Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Spanish actors Category:Spanish writers Category:Spanish theatre directors
title: Carlos Álvarez-Nóvoa
